import React, { Component } from 'react'; class MobieDecription extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { display: "", revolution: "", widescreen: "", operation: "", camera1: "", camera2: "", cpu: "", ram: "", memory: "", microcard: "", sim: "", network: "", pin: "", quickcharging: "", weight: "", thick: "", color: "" } } render() { const {onChange} = this.props; return (
); } } export default MobieDecription;
